name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi対バン企画 LAST V STANDiNG vol.3 #LVS3【GUEST：MaiR】 [_qqd8XuHnUA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Opening title screen and intro music for the event.
Performance of the song 'Eternity Bright' by AZKi and MaiR.

subtitles.original: AZKi対バン企画 LAST V STANDING vol.3
subtitles.english: AZKi Versus Project: LAST V STANDING vol.3

subtitles.original: 零れ光る あなたの声
subtitles.english: Overflowing and shining, your voice

subtitles.original: 暗い闇を照らす
subtitles.english: Illuminating the dark darkness

subtitles.original: LVS3始まりました！盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: LVS3 has started! Let's get excited!

subtitles.original: 乾いた空を越えて巡る
subtitles.english: Traveling across the dry sky

subtitles.original: 記憶の色は 褪せて溶け滲んだ
subtitles.english: The colors of memories have faded, melted, and blurred

subtitles.original: 冷たい空気刻む 時の針が
subtitles.english: The hands of time carving the cold air

subtitles.original: 孤独の淵へ誘う
subtitles.english: Inviting me to the edge of loneliness

subtitles.original: 交わした思いは消えないよ
subtitles.english: The feelings we exchanged will never disappear

subtitles.original: 誓いあった未来で会うため
subtitles.english: To meet in the future we promised each other

subtitles.original: 満ちた波に浮かぶ星は
subtitles.english: The stars floating on the full waves

subtitles.original: 遠い夢を映し燃えていく
subtitles.english: Reflecting distant dreams and burning away

subtitles.original: 僅か触れた指の熱を
subtitles.english: The heat of the fingers that barely touched

subtitles.original: 呼び覚ませる幻
subtitles.english: A phantom that can be awakened

subtitles.original: 逃れられない運命でも
subtitles.english: Even if it's an inescapable fate

subtitles.original: かけがえのない存在に救われ
subtitles.english: Saved by an irreplaceable existence

subtitles.original: 煌めく風を掴むように
subtitles.english: As if to catch the sparkling wind

subtitles.original: 崩れる世界
subtitles.english: The crumbling world,

subtitles.original: 信じた
subtitles.english: I believed

subtitles.original: 鼓動と揺れる瞳の奥
subtitles.english: A heartbeat and the depths of swaying eyes

subtitles.original: 忘れないよ 透明な涙
subtitles.english: I won't forget, the transparent tears

subtitles.original: 静寂に包まれた
subtitles.english: Enveloped in silence

subtitles.original: 蒼い月 祈りを込める
subtitles.english: The blue moon, I offer a prayer

subtitles.original: ただ一つ不変の愛
subtitles.english: The only unchanging love

subtitles.original: 抱きしめて踏み出した
subtitles.english: Embracing it, I stepped forward

subtitles.original: 零れ響くあなたの声
subtitles.english: Spilling and echoing, your voice

subtitles.original: 生きる意味を繋ぐぬくもり
subtitles.english: The warmth that connects the meaning of life

subtitles.original: 二人ここで重ねた日は永遠に
subtitles.english: The days we spent together here will be forever
